akn:content.akn:p: (c) The duties of the Advisory Committee are as follows:

(d) The expenses of the Advisory Committee that the Secretary of the Treasury determines to be reasonable and appropriate shall be paid by the Secretary from the United States Mint Public Enterprise Fund.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Administrative Support, Technical Services, and Advice.—

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Upon the request of the Advisory Committee, or as necessary for the Advisory Committee to carry out the responsibilities of the Advisory Committee under this section, the Director of the United States Mint shall provide to the Advisory Committee the administrative support, technical services, and advice that the Secretary of the Treasury determines to be reasonable and appropriate.
(f) In carrying out the duties of the Advisory Committee under this section, the Advisory Committee may consult with the Commission of Fine Arts.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Chapter 10 of Title 5 Does Not Apply.—

akn:content.akn:p: (h) Subject to the requirements of subsection (b)(8), chapter 10 of title 5 shall not apply with respect to the Committee.
